comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content:
Outside Grant's Tomb.

Rear Admiral Ching Pih Kwang and Mayoer Gaynor.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: lifeasdaddy: Thanks for the info. about Kwang's visit to Grant's Tomb. We'll add it to the description next time we update the record.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: As if seeing Grant's tomb were not excitement enough, the Admiral also enjoyed a luncheon with Grant's son, General Frederick Dent Grant, at his HQ on Governor's Island. [He also climbed a New York skyscraper still under construction, and attended a theatrical performance.] New York Times story, September 23, 1911: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?_r=1&res=9C07E...

comment.author: 70251312@N00
